Translations.Text: Kazhu, "ya buv nadykhnutyy shcho hrupa jinns poslukhala, todi skazala, `we pochuly dyvovyzhnyy Quran
it dovidnyky do righteousness, ta my viryly v tse; my nikoly ne vstanovymo budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya nashoho Lorda
the Naybilʹsh Vysoko ye nash tilʹky Lord. Vin nikoly ne mav tovarysha, ne syna
it yavlyaye soboyu durni sered nas khto zvychayno vymovlyav take bez·hluzdya pro BOHA
we podumav shcho ni humans, ni jinns, mih mozhlyvo vymovyty brekhnyu pro BOHA
human istoty zvychayno shukaly potuzhnosti cherez jinn istot, ale vony tilʹky afflicted yim z duzhe bahato neshchastya
they podumani, tochno, yak vy podumaly,,, kotryy BOH poshle inshyy (kur'yer)
we torknuvsya nebes ta znaydenoho tse zapovnenyy z vartamy formidable ta projectiles
we zvychayno sydiv tam dlya toho, shchob rozvidnyk. Budʹ khto khto slukhaye peresliduyetʹsya potuzhnyy projectile
we ne mayutʹ ideyi yakshcho shchosʹ pohane spryamovane na meshkantsiv Zemli, abo yakshcho yikhniy Lord wills shchob vykupyty yikh
some nas ye spravedlyvi, ta deyakyy menshe, nizh spravedlyvi; my sliduyemo za riznomanitnymy shlyakhamy
we znaly povni dobre shcho my mozhemo nikoly ne utikty z BOHA na Zemli; my mozhemo nikoly ne utikty ta vtecha
when my pochuly kerivnytstvo, my vvazhaly tam. Budʹ khto khto virytʹ v yoho Lordu bude nikoly ne bo budʹ-yakoyi nespravedlyvosti, ne budʹ-yakoho affliction
